snippet: One of the obvious names missing from the men's catwalking calendar in London this weekend is Paul Smith, one of the most recognizable names in British fashion for more than 40 years.
abstract: One of the obvious names missing from the men's catwalking calendar in London this weekend is Paul Smith, one of the most recognizable names in British fashion for more than 40 years.

headline.main: The Surprising Mr. Smith, and Other Party Notes
